thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DDM Holding Q4 Cash EBITDA Rises To EUR 11.2 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DDM Holding Q4 Cash EBITDA Rises To EUR 11.2 Million
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - DDM HOLDING AG:
* Q4 CASH EBITDA EUR 11.2 MILLION VERSUS EUR 8.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 NET COLLECTIONS EUR 12.7 MILLION VERSUS EUR 10.4 MILLION YEAR AGO
* IN 2018 OUR TARGET IS TO DOUBLE OUR INVESTMENTS COMPARED TO 2017 BY INVESTING MORE THAN EUR 165M
* IN 2018 WE ANTICIPATE OPERATING EXPENSES OF EUR 8M * BOARD HAS PROPOSED THAT NO DIVIDEND BE PAID OUT FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
